items.label: Are the tools safe?
items.content: Yes, all our tools are designed with the highest security standards. Extensions only modify the visual interface and automations use limited access credentials.

items.label: Do I need technical knowledge to use the tools?
items.content: No, our tools are designed to be easy to use. Extensions install with just a few clicks and we configure automations for you.

items.label: What happens if Little Hotelier updates their platform?
items.content: We constantly monitor changes in Little Hotelier and update our tools to maintain compatibility. Updates are automatic.

items.label: Can I request custom tools?
items.content: Of course. We offer custom tool development according to your hotel's specific needs. Contact us for more information.

items.label: Is technical support available?
items.content: Yes, we offer technical support for all our tools. You can contact us by email, chat or phone.

items.label: Do the tools affect Little Hotelier's performance?
items.content: No, our tools are optimized to not affect the platform's performance. Extensions only modify the visual presentation and automations work independently.

security.label: Are Hotelier Tools secure?
security.content: Yes, all our tools are designed with the highest security standards. Extensions only modify the visual interface and automations use limited access credentials with minimal permissions.

easy_use.label: Do I need technical knowledge to use the tools?
easy_use.content: No, our tools are designed to be easy to use. Extensions install with just a few clicks and we configure automations for you. We provide step-by-step guides for everything.

compatibility.label: What happens if Little Hotelier updates their platform?
compatibility.content: We constantly monitor changes in Little Hotelier and update our tools to maintain compatibility. Updates are automatic and transparent to the user.

custom_tools.label: Can I request custom tools?
custom_tools.content: Absolutely. We offer custom tool development according to your hotel's specific needs. Our technical team will work with you to create tailored solutions.

support.label: Is technical support available?
support.content: Yes, we offer technical support during specific hours. You can contact us via email and we will respond as quickly as possible. We also have complete documentation available.

performance.label: Do the tools affect Little Hotelier's performance?
performance.content: No, our tools are optimized to not affect platform performance. Extensions only modify the visual presentation and automations work independently.

script_updates.label: How do I update the web enhancement scripts?
script_updates.content: Within the Tampermonkey administration panel you will get a notification to update the scripts, although you can always copy and paste the latest version from the repository.

mobile_support.label: Do the scripts work on mobile devices?
mobile_support.content: The scripts do not work in standard mobile browsers like Chrome for Android or Safari for iOS. However, on Android you can use Kiwi Browser which is compatible with Tampermonkey, although the configuration is more complex.

automation_permissions.label: What permissions do automations need?
automation_permissions.content: Automations only require limited read and write permissions on your Little Hotelier account. We never request full administrative permissions and only access the minimum data necessary.

disable_automation.label: Can I temporarily disable an automation?
disable_automation.content: Yes, you can pause any automation by contacting our support. We are working on a control panel where you can manage all your automations. You can also disable the provided user and the automations will stop working.

pricing.label: What is the pricing for the tools?
pricing.content: We offer different options according to your needs. Browser extensions are free, while automations may require custom configuration.

data_privacy.label: What data do you access and how do you protect it?
data_privacy.content: We only access the minimum data necessary for each function. We do not store sensitive guest or financial information. All data is processed securely.

details.title: Intelligent Automation Features
details.subtitle: Discover how our bot thinks instead of you, saving money, time and preventing problems before they occur

checkout.longDescription: Our bot automatically processes checkout for all reservations at the end of their stay date, eliminating the need for manual intervention and ensuring accurate records. The task would check the reservation is completed paid and the system has all the data required to check-out the guest.
checkout.feature1: Automatic checkout at end of stay date
checkout.feature3: Email in case of errors or issues

payments.longDescription: Continuously monitors payment status across all booking channels, detecting incomplete or failed payments before they become major issues for your hotel. usually happen when the client do not confirm the payment with the bank but have leave all information about the reservation.
payments.feature3: Check payments not verified and not completed

guests.longDescription: Validates that all required guest information is complete and accurate, ensuring compliance with local regulations and smooth check-in processes. Some hotels requires to have a ID card or Passport number to be able to check-in the guest.

unconfirmed.longDescription: Proactively identifies reservations with pending bank confirmations or payment issues, allowing your team to resolve problems before guest arrival.

prices.longDescription: Automatically corrects pricing discrepancies for little misalignments and cent rounding errors that can occur during rate synchronization across different booking platforms. This usually happens when applying a discount on Direct Booking for multiples days that does not match a price per night equals on all nights. The error appears between the money paid and the total price for the reservation.

invoices.longDescription: Generates and manages invoices automatically with all required fiscal information, ensuring compliance and reducing administrative workload. We would create a folder and we would save all invoices in a folder with the month and year of the invoice, so you can easily find it later. We can also upload to OneDrive or Google Drive to have a backup of all invoices.
invoices.feature3: Generates all invoices without checking one by one manually
